text: feeling at casa wherever wi-fi connects tbh
yet nothing beats finding those hidden gem spots that no tourist guide ever lists – kind of personalizes your city map you know?
feels different when you're always hopping between code & classes😅🚀
Space feels more 'home' when there’s stable wifi and comfort food.
moved around a lot lately too - 'home' feels more like where i find peace after constantly switching cities
felt grown-up when balancing study & part-time coding gigs made party weekends extinct
coding marathons mean missing out too - feels like i'm dating my laptop sometimes
